text: This a family tree of the kings of Jerusalem. This diagram lists the rulers of the kingdom of Jerusalem, since the conquest of the city in 1099, during the First Crusade, to 1291, year of the fall of Acre. ==See also== *Crusade *Kings of Jerusalem *Kingdom of Jerusalem *Vassals of the Kingdom of Jerusalem *Officers of the Kingdom of Jerusalem *Haute Cour of Jerusalem *Assizes of Jerusalem *A 1911 map showing the Kingdom of Jerusalem and the other Crusader states. ==References== ==External links== Category:Family trees Tree Category:Dynasty genealogy
title: Family tree of Kingdom of Jerusalem monarchs
